data.eml:eml: A taxonomic study on semifumata species-group of Fissocantharis Pic, with description of six new species from China and Myanmar (Coleoptera, Cantharidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Yuxia, Yang, Xingke (2011): A taxonomic study on semifumata species-group of Fissocantharis Pic, with description of six new species from China and Myanmar (Coleoptera, Cantharidae). ZooKeys 152: 43-61, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.152.2070, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.152.2070
